class ViewController: UIViewController {

    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
        // Do any additional setup after loading the view.
        view.backgroundColor = .white
        test()
    }
    
    func test() {
        var conf1 = UIButton.Configuration.plain()
        conf1.title = "ç‚¹èµ"
        conf1.image = UIImage(named: "liked")
        conf1.imagePlacement = .leading
        conf1.imagePadding = 10
        let bt1 = UIButton.init(configuration: conf1, primaryAction: nil)
        
        var conf2 = UIButton.Configuration.bordered()
        conf2.title = "ç‚¹èµ"
        conf2.image = UIImage(named: "liked")
        conf2.imagePlacement = .trailing
        conf2.imagePadding = 40
        let bt2 = UIButton.init(configuration: conf2, primaryAction: nil)
        
        var conf3 = UIButton.Configuration.borderedTinted()
        conf3.title = "ç‚¹èµ"
        conf3.image = UIImage(named: "liked")
        conf3.imagePlacement = .top
        conf3.imagePadding = 10
        let bt3 = UIButton.init(configuration: conf3, primaryAction: nil)
        
        var conf4 = UIButton.Configuration.gray()
        conf4.title = "ç‚¹èµ"
        conf4.image = UIImage(named: "liked")
        conf4.imagePlacement = .bottom
        conf4.imagePadding = 10
        let bt4 = UIButton.init(configuration: conf4, primaryAction: nil)
        
        bt1.frame = CGRect(x: 50, y: 100, width: 100, height: 80)
        bt2.frame = CGRect(x: 200, y: 100, width: 150, height: 80)
        bt3.frame = CGRect(x: 50, y: 230, width: 100, height: 80)
        bt4.frame = CGRect(x: 200, y: 230, width: 100, height: 80)
        
        view.addSubview(bt1)
        view.addSubview(bt2)
        view.addSubview(bt3)
        view.addSubview(bt4)

    }

}

@interface UILabel (EasyMake)
+(UILabel *)lbMakeWithSuperV:(UIView *)superV
                       frame:(CGRect)frame
                        font:(UIFont *)font
                   alignment:(NSTextAlignment)alignment
                        text:(NSString *)text
                   textColor:(UIColor *)textColor;


@implementation UILabel (EasyMake)
+(UILabel *)lbMakeWithSuperV:(UIView *)superV
                       frame:(CGRect)frame
                        font:(UIFont *)font
                   alignment:(NSTextAlignment)alignment
                        text:(NSString *)text
                   textColor:(UIColor *)textColor
{
    UILabel *lb = [[UILabel alloc]init];
    if (superV) {
        [superV addSubview:lb];
    }
    if (font) {
        lb.font = font;
    }
    if (text) {
        lb.text = text;
    }
    if (textColor) {
        lb.textColor = textColor;
    }
    lb.frame = frame;
    lb.textAlignment = alignment;
    return lb;
}
@end

-(void)contentOffsetBlockAction:(NSDictionary<NSKeyValueChangeKey,id> *)change
{

    CGFloat lastContentOffsetY = [self.pp_lastContentOffsetY floatValue];

    //æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å‘ä¸Šæ»‘ï¼Œåˆå§‹å€¼ä¸ºNO

        //å¤„ç†æ»‘åŠ¨åˆ°åº•éƒ¨ï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¸Šæ»‘åç³»ç»Ÿè‡ªåŠ¨åå¼¹è€Œé‡å¤è°ƒç”¨çš„æƒ…å†µ

        if (currentContentOffsetY <= self.pp_FSB_insetT) {

-(void)btnClickedDown:(UIButton *)sender

-(void)panAction:(UIPanGestureRecognizer *)panGR

    //1. è·å–æ‰‹æŒ‡å½“å‰ä½ç½®çš„point

    //2. éå†selfä¸Šçš„æ‰€æœ‰è‡ªè§†å›¾ï¼ˆUIButton *ï¼‰,å¦‚æœå®ƒçš„tagå’Œä¸Šæ¬¡ä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œæ‰§è¡ŒtouchDownæ–¹æ³•
    for (UIView *aV in self.subviews) {
        if ([aV isKindOfClass:[UIButton class]] && aV.tag != _selectedBtnTag && CGRectContainsPoint(aV.frame, fingerTapPoint)) {
            _selectedBtnTag = aV.tag;

    //3. æ‰‹åŠ¿ç»“æŸæ—¶ï¼Œéšè—å±å¹•ä¸­é—´çš„showIndexLB
    if (panGR.state == UIGestureRecognizerStateEnded) {

    }
}

- (BOOL)textField:(UITextField *)textField shouldChangeCharactersInRange:(NSRange)range replacementString:(NSString *)string {
    NSCharacterSet *charSet = [[NSCharacterSet characterSetWithCharactersInString:@"0123456789"] invertedSet];
    NSString *filteredStr = [[string componentsSeparatedByCharactersInSet:charSet] componentsJoinedByString:@""];
    if ([string isEqualToString:filteredStr]) {
        return YES;
    }
    return NO;
}

/// A type that can be initialized with a floating-point literal.
///
/// The standard library floating-point types---`Float`, `Double`, and
/// `Float80` where available---all conform to the `ExpressibleByFloatLiteral`
/// protocol. You can initialize a variable or constant of any of these types
/// by assigning a floating-point literal.
///
/// Â  Â  // Type inferred as 'Double'
/// Â  Â  let threshold = 6.0
///
/// Â  Â  // An array of 'Double'
/// Â  Â  let measurements = [2.2, 4.1, 3.65, 4.2, 9.1]
///
/// Conforming to ExpressibleByFloatLiteral
/// =======================================
///
/// To add `ExpressibleByFloatLiteral` conformance to your custom type,
/// implement the required initializer.
public protocol ExpressibleByFloatLiteral {

Â  Â  /// A type that represents a floating-point literal.
Â  Â  ///
Â  Â  /// Valid types for `FloatLiteralType` are `Float`, `Double`, and `Float80`
Â  Â  /// where available.
Â  Â  associatedtype FloatLiteralType : _ExpressibleByBuiltinFloatLiteral

Â  Â  /// Creates an instance initialized to the specified floating-point value.
Â  Â  ///
Â  Â  /// Do not call this initializer directly. Instead, initialize a variable or
Â  Â  /// constant using a floating-point literal. For example:
Â  Â  ///
Â  Â  /// Â  Â  let x = 21.5
Â  Â  ///
Â  Â  /// In this example, the assignment to the `x` constant calls this
Â  Â  /// floating-point literal initializer behind the scenes.
Â  Â  ///
Â  Â  /// - Parameter value: The value to create.
Â  Â  init(floatLiteral value: Self.FloatLiteralType)
Â  Â 
}
